attributes.action: hold a referendum on the EU 'Reform Treaty' before ratification.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An agreement on the reform of the EU institutions was reached at the European Council in Brussels on 23 June. EU leaders agreed the mandate for an Intergovernmental Conference which will draw up the Reform Treaty by the end of 2007. If ratified, this treaty could come into force in June 2009.

Given that the Reform Treaty contains a substantial amount of the previously proposed EU Constitution, increases the power of the European Parliament and represents a major derogation of UK political sovereignty, a public debate and referendum on this critical issue would be both logical and democratic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
